data.why:
A perl package that provides a simple API for the PCR primer design
    program Primer3 and the PCR primer validation program e-PCR. The
    purpose of the package is to provide a unified interface to these
    different programs and provide the means to design and test PCR
    primers with the same. The Primers and e-PCR programs are both
    unix-specific binaries. Another advantage offered by this package is
    that it supports platform indepenendent programatic access to the
    programs via a remote server.
